TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebSuccessAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供有关成功安全事件的信息。

span.span: Provides information about successful security events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 成功的与安全相关操作发生时使用类。The class is used when a successful security-related operation occurs. 此示例是 Web 请求的成功 URL 授权。An example of this is a successful URL authorization for a Web request. 以下列表描述类型的事件的功能由 ASP.NET 引发：The following list describes the features for which events of type are raised by ASP.NET: - 文件授权。File Authorization. 审核成功的条件。Successful conditions are audited. 当 Windows 标识与请求相关联时，由 ASP.NET 时才会尝试文件授权。File authorization is only attempted by ASP.NET when a Windows Identity is associated with the request. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . - URL 授权。URL Authorization. 它表示被授权的 URL 资源的访问的权限。It signifies access of a URL resource for which authorization is granted. 审核成功的条件。Successful conditions are audited. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . - 其他安全条件。Other security conditions. 下面是相关的事件代码的列表：The following is a list of the related event codes: - - 当是引发，ASP.NET 运行状况监视递增相关的审核成功事件引发的性能计数器，然后检查`healthMonitoring`配置以确定是否有任何提供程序订阅事件。When a is raised, ASP.NET health monitoring increments the related Audit Success Events Raised performance counter and then checks the `healthMonitoring` configuration to determine whether any providers subscribe to the event. 如果提供程序订阅事件，ASP.NET 会将分配到这些事件进行处理。If providers subscribe to the event, ASP.NET dispatches the event to them for processing. > [!NOTE] > 若要查看在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中的引发的审核成功事件性能计数器**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**从**性能对象**下拉列表中，选择**引发的审核成功事件**性能计数器，然后单击**添加**按钮。To view the Audit Success Event Raised performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the **Audit Success Event Raised** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[监视 ASP.NET 应用程序性能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5)。For more information, see [Monitoring ASP.NET Application Performance](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5). 成功审核表示预期的情况，因为可能不想要订阅它们。Because success audits represent an expected condition, you may not want to subscribe to them. 为了提供对该站点的审核的访问权限，您可以向其订阅。You can subscribe to them in order to provide access auditing for the site. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义审核事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom audit event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/CS/websuccessauditevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/VB/websuccessauditevent.vb#1)] 下面的示例摘自配置文件，它使 ASP.NET 运行状况监视，以便使用该事件。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET health monitoring to use the event. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来实例化对象，但实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数`SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent`类。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent` class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/CS/websuccessauditevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/VB/websuccessauditevent.vb#2)]

protected public: WebSuccessAuditEvent(System::String ^ message, System::Object ^ eventSource, int eventCode, int eventDetailCode);

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来实例化对象，但实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数`SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent`类。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent` class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/CS/websuccessauditevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/VB/websuccessauditevent.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void IncrementPerfCounters() cil managed

summary.span: 递增“引发的审核成功事件”性能计数器。

span.span: Increments the Audit Success Events Raised performance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 审核成功事件引发的性能计数器跟踪自应用程序启动以来引发成功审核事件的数量。The Audit Success Events Raised performance counter tracks the number of successful audit events raised since the application started. 此方法还会调用父方法，引发的事件计数器会递增。This method also calls the parent method, which increments the Events Raised counter. 此计数器可跟踪引发的事件的总数。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要查看这些性能计数器在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**从**性能对象**下拉列表中，选择你想要查看，请单击性能计数器**添加**按钮。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[监视 ASP.NET 应用程序性能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5)。For more information, see [Monitoring ASP.NET Application Performance](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5).
